sentences.en: 'It's really important that we capture all these ideas, but that we wrap a little bit of rigor around them it can't be a glorified suggestion box, ' he said.
sentences.cn: 他说：我们获得所有这些想法非常重要，但我们在这些想法上加了一点严厉的要求──光是个表面光鲜的意见箱可不行。

sentences.en: Balance rigor with agility when defining project processes.
sentences.cn: 当定义项目过程时,要平衡灵活性和准确性.

sentences.en: Don , t treat him so rigor, he is just a child.
sentences.cn: 不要对他太苛刻, 他只不过是孩子.

sentences.en: It has the virtues of brachylogy rigor and precise.
sentences.cn: 它具有简明、精确、无歧义的优点.

sentences.en: Many other treatises incorporated the new rigor.
sentences.cn: 许多其它的专题论文体现了新的严密性.

sentences.en: Mathematical rigor is applied where necessary and numerous proofs are included.
sentences.cn: 数学严厉被在必要和许多证据被包括的地方使用.

sentences.en: Rigor mortis had already set in.
sentences.cn: 尸体已经僵硬.

sentences.en: Rigor mortis, pallor, rot - these too can be sources of exquisite sensation.
sentences.cn: 死后僵硬, 惨败, 腐坏 — 这些同样能成为精美绝伦的感受的源泉.

sentences.en: Spoken communication supplements the code's rigor and detail with meaning.
sentences.cn: 口头的交流在语义上弥补了代码的太过精密和太过细节的问题.

sentences.en: Standards will seem unnecessary high; rigor will seem unwarranted.
sentences.cn: 标准会显得没必要的高, 严格程度也会显得没道理.

sentences.en: The crime will be treated with the full rigor of the law.
sentences.cn: 这一罪行会严格依法审理。

sentences.en: The family could not stand the rigor of the long cold winter.
sentences.cn: 这个家忍受不了漫长而寒冷的冬天.

sentences.en: The towers, not only ground the buildings with their visual weight, but they also contribute to the rigor of rhythmic play needed in such expansive internal spaces and environment.
sentences.cn: 这些塔楼不仅利用其视觉上的厚重感将建筑物固定在地面上，还有助于生成这种开阔的内部空间和环境所需的严谨的韵律感。

sentences.en: The transformation process depends on the rigor by which the analysis was performed.
sentences.cn: 转换过程严格尊守先前的分析.

sentences.en: Their analysis lacks rigor.
sentences.cn: 他们的分析缺乏严谨性。

sentences.en: Their research seems to me to be lacking in rigor.
sentences.cn: 他们的研究在我看来不够严谨。

sentences.en: They apply project management knowledge, skills, and processes in different orders and degrees of rigor to achieve the desired project performance.
sentences.cn: 他们通过应用不同顺序与严格程度的项目管理知识、技能和过程，来达到项目理想的效果。

sentences.en: This approach represents the next level of rigor in modeling.
sentences.cn: 此方法表现出建模中的下一个精确级别。

sentences.en: We are not so much testing as proposal-thinning, and we can add rigor such as traceability and other documentation as the leading architectural candidates emerge.
sentences.cn: 我们不像细化提议那样做太多测试，随着最主要的架构候选的出现，我们可以添加严密，如可溯性和其他文档。

sentences.en: We have tried to keep explanations elementary without sacrificing depth of coverage and mathematical rigor.
sentences.cn: 我试图保持一种通俗的阐述,同时又不失广泛的覆盖面和数学的严谨.

sentences.en: With professional rigor to assure quality and create satisfied customers.
sentences.cn: 用专业的角度要求品质,创造市场.
